extendedInfo.description: 10000000 is a Dungeon Crawling RPG Matching Game. Run the dungeon and match to handle the things you encounter *WINNER* Best Mobile Exclusive 2012 - Game Informer*WINNER* Best Puzzle Game - 5th Annual Best App Ever Awards*WINNER* Pocket Tactics Puzzle GOTY 2012*RUNNER UP* Touch Arcade GOTY 2012âThis game is so good it makes me want to cryâ - Eli Hodapp â Editor In Chief â TouchArcade âFreedom costs 10 million. Iâm half-hoping I never make itâ - Mike Fahey â Kotaku âMashes together two of the most interesting genres of the last years: the puzzle RPG and infinite runner. And itâs damned good.â - Owen Faraday â Pocket Tactics Upgrade your castle, improve your gear, train skills and brew potions Can you score 10000000 and earn your freedom? â Kill monsters and find loot â Improve your gear and train skills â Find wood and stone to improve your castle Test your skill â More than 60 objectives to complete â Over 20 different monster types to fight â Find items and use them effectively â Fast paced action gameplay Classic Gaming â Retro graphics â Old school music "I played this for like 8 hours, it's a fantastic little game." "I got sucked into this more than I expected" "Adds so much to the genre, What a great game!"

reviews.title: Really good game, a bit short maybe
reviews.comment: Fun mechanics and pretty well balanced, finished it in 3.5 hours and had good time all the way.
reviews.author: Kristoffer Lund\303\251n

reviews.title: Can\'t...stop...playing
reviews.comment: Really truly awesome casual mobile game. You guys that beat in a few hours are freaks, I\'m still working on it, and for 2 bucks were you expecting 20hrs of content? Anyway, amazing game.
reviews.author: Jessica Tekenos

reviews.title: Good game, needs more content
reviews.comment: I had a great time playing this game and it\'s very engaging but ultimately it was a bit too easy and needs more.
reviews.author: Michael Roberts

reviews.title: Fun for a bit.
reviews.comment: Gets boring fast and almost nothing left after you hit the games namesake in points.
reviews.author: Matthew Meadows

reviews.title: awesome game
reviews.comment: nice graphics, well designed and balanced setting, finished in 2 hours and still playing, good job producing this game
reviews.author: Billy Law

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Loved it, simple concept vuy great fun game play. Well worth it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One of the best Android games I\'ve found
reviews.comment: Cool idea executed well, and no in app purchase BS. Fantastic game.
reviews.author: Adam Glasgow

reviews.title: Brilliant Fun!
reviews.comment: This game is excellent -  perfect combination of charming old-school pixel art and addictive object-matching gameplay.
reviews.author: Victor Jones

reviews.title: Fun but could be better
reviews.comment: It\'s a fun game, but it could be better. Not a big fan of the tiles being linked. Was hopping for a candy crush type of tile system. This system is flawed in that no matter how well you play some times the board cant be used well.
reviews.author: Bryce Johns

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.comment: A delightful combination of puzzle, runner, and rpg. Plus I\'m a sucker for the retro style graphics and music. It\'s a little too easy but nevertheless fun while it lasts.
reviews.author: Josef Svenningsson

reviews.title: Great value
reviews.comment: Extremely fun way to drop $2. Great puzzle game play with satisfying progression. I played until my battery was drained, charged, and played some more, pretty much giving this game my whole afternoon.
reviews.author: Michael Kelehan

reviews.title: Excellent!!!
reviews.comment: It\'s not often I buy a game that I think about playing when I can\'t and look forward to playing as soon as I can, but both things are true of this one.  If you like puzzles with an RPG twist (or even if you typically don\'t), give this game a try!  Simple, yet deep...and well-worth the money.  Good job!!!
reviews.author: Todd Adam Hewlett

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: Great game, keeps me coming back. It does a good job of adding a purpose to matching tile games. I\'d recommend it.
reviews.author: Mike Brits

reviews.title: Fun game, a bit short.
reviews.comment: The android version of the 10000000 seems to be much easier than the PC version, but it\'s still just as fun.  Easy to learn and a interesting take on the match-three puzzle genre.
reviews.author: Phil Tadio, Jr.

reviews.title: Excellent but quick
reviews.comment: Really good and fun game but it\'s easily completed and there isn\'t much to do once you have unlocked everything.
reviews.author: Adam Richards

reviews.title: Great Puzzler/Dungeon Game
reviews.comment: Very addicting! Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Michael Black

reviews.title: Need more levels
reviews.comment: I like this game and it was easy,  so can you make more levels of puzzle. Thanks
reviews.author: Dmitrij Timofejev

reviews.title: Very cool
reviews.comment: I bought the game based soley on the ratings and so far I am not disappointed at all.  Very fun and challenging.   I especially like the variations of weapons and armor and updates to the castle rooms.   Took a little bit of getting used to as i thought it was swap tiles but it is scrolling lines of tiles.   Anyway,  lots of entertainment value for only two bucks.
reviews.author: Bill Schoonmaker

reviews.title: One of the best games.
reviews.comment: From the moment I started 10000000, I was in love. The game is simple, but engaging. Beware: you may get addicted.
reviews.author: Steven Boland

reviews.title: A bejeweled built for men
reviews.comment: This game was very appealing to the retro dugeon crawling and easy to play. The depth of upgrades and familiar game style of every housewifes favorite game makes this a top pick for all people
reviews.author: Matthew Stohr
